医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
健康是一项人权吗？美国内科医师学会的答案是肯定的！美国医师学会主张健康是一项基本人权，主张美国进行符合道德义务和人权原则的医疗改革。该文件回顾了全球对健康权的不同观点，并呼吁美国履行其道义责任，确保所有公民的健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Is-health-a- human-right-The-American-College-of-Physicians-answers-with-an-emphatic-YES!.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231102/Is-health-a- human-right-The-American-College-of-Physicians-answers-with-an-emphatic-YES!.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15234165-719b-4ce5-b2c1-5998e9b7a1ac Thu, 02 Nov 2023 00:05:00 -0400 Is health a human right? The American College of Physicians answers with an emphatic YES!
生物标志物的发现将长期新冠肺炎预测准确率提高至 78.5%研究人员确定了与长期新冠肺炎相关的四种关键生物标志物，预测病情的准确度为 78.5%。这一发现为诊断测试铺平了道路，并提供了对新冠肺炎后持续症状机制的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Biomarker-discovery-boosts-long-COVID-prediction-accuracy-to-78525.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Biomarker-discovery-boosts-long-COVID-prediction-accuracy-to-78525.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03a15fd6-c080-4b9a-90b4-1fced21c364a Wed, 01 Nov 2023 23:43:00 -0400 Biomarker discovery boosts long-COVID prediction accuracy to 78.5%
海藻共生体揭示了潜在药物化合物的宝库与海洋大型藻类相关的芽孢杆菌揭示了一系列具有潜在药理学益处（从抗菌到抗癌）的生物活性化合物。这篇全面的综述阐明了这些海洋微生物的有前景但尚未充分探索的治疗应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Seaweed-symbionts-reveal-treasure-trove-of-pottial-drug-compounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Seaweed-symbionts-reveal-treasure-trove-of-pottial-drug-compounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0dbe12e-4f64-4dba-bea0-c08765a320e4 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 21:56:00 -0400 Seaweed symbionts reveal treasure trove of potential drug compounds
研究发现，在氟化漆中添加钙和磷酸盐并不是对抗儿童蛀牙的灵丹妙药该研究探讨了添加钙和磷酸盐的氟化钠清漆与传统清漆相比在减少学龄前儿童口腔中有害细菌方面的有效性。结果表明，两种类型的清漆在控制细菌生长方面没有显着差异，因此需要对对抗儿童早期龋齿的有效方法进行更多研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Added-calcium-and-磷酸盐-in-fluide-varnishes-no-silver-bullet-for-fighting-kids-tooth-decay-study-finds。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Added-calcium-and-磷酸盐-in-fluide-varnishes-no-silver-bullet-for-fighting-kids-tooth-decay-study-finds。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41bd02bb-dab0-41d7-ac04-f81ef77f7359 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 19:46:00 -0400 Added calcium and phosphate in fluoride varnishes no silver bullet for fighting kids' tooth decay, study finds
掩盖问题：高质量研究证实口罩可显着抑制 COVID-19 传播JAMA Network Open 上的这篇“特别通讯”文章汇集了高质量的研究，强调了口罩在遏制 SARS-CoV-2 社区传播方面的有效性。文章强调，外科口罩比布口罩更有效，而且戴口罩是一种重要的公共卫生工具，既可以与疫苗接种和社交距离等其他措施结合使用，也可以独立于其他措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Masking-up-matters-High-quality-studies-confirm-face-masks-significantly-curb-COVID-19-spread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Masking-up-matters-High-quality-studies-confirm-face-masks-significantly-curb-COVID-19-spread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55dd9472-5f9a-4945-b0a4-ba5c4c1517cf Wed, 01 Nov 2023 18:42:00 -0400 Masking up matters: High-quality studies confirm face masks significantly curb COVID-19 spread
高灵敏度血液检测有望早期发现常见致命癌症大多数癌症因保持低调而变得致命，在发展到无法治疗之前不会引起任何症状。卵巢癌和胃食管癌是这种狡猾的疾病进展中最臭名昭著的癌症之一，通常导致晚期诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Highly-sensitive-blood-test-shows-promise-for-early-detection-of-common-deadly-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Highly-sensitive-blood-test-shows-promise-for-early-detection-of-common-deadly-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f4bd612-1bec-460b-a44b-ae1ca185398a Wed, 01 Nov 2023 17:04:00 -0400 Highly sensitive blood test shows promise for early detection of common deadly cancers
脉冲场消融对房颤女性安全有效根据西奈山伊坎医学院领导的一项大规模国际研究，接受脉冲场消融 (PFA) 手术的女性房颤 (AF) 与接受相同手术的房颤男性患者具有同样良好的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Pulsed-field-ablation-safe-and- effective-for-women-with-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Pulsed-field-ablation-safe-and- effective-for-women-with-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e10c4b41-648a-4177-a2ec-618da4a4d5b3 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 16:56:00 -0400 Pulsed field ablation safe and effective for women with atrial fibrillation
CU眼科教授获得资助研究帕金森病生物标志物对于某些人来说，眼睛是心灵的窗户。但对于科罗拉多大学医学院眼科教授 Jayashree Kalpathy-Cramer 博士来说，它们是了解人类健康的一个窗口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/CU-professor-of-oducing-receives-grant-to-study-Parkinsons-disease-biomarkers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/CU-professor-of-otropical-receives-grant-to-study-Parkinsons-disease-biomarkers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=284b3c1a-911c-4933-98e5-bd354d4e3dbc Wed, 01 Nov 2023 16:50:00 -0400 CU professor of ophthalmology receives grant to study Parkinson's disease biomarkers
研究表明手机使用与年轻男性精液质量之间存在联系手机发出的电磁辐射会影响精液质量吗？虽然人们提出了各种环境和生活方式因素来解释过去五十年中观察到的精液质量下降，但手机的作用尚未得到证实。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Study-shows-link- Between-mobile-phone-use-and-semen-quality-of-young-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/Study-shows-link- Between-mobile-phone-use-and-semen-quality-of-young-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae9b778b-0b8e-4544-ab8d-e85be7e6de93 Wed, 01 Nov 2023 16:44:00 -0400 Study shows link between mobile phone use and semen quality of young men
高盐摄入量与患 2 型糖尿病的风险增加相关那些有 2 型糖尿病风险的人可能已经知道要避免吃糖，但新的研究表明他们可能也想不吃盐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/High-salt-conspiration-linked-with-increased-risk-of-developmenting-Type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231101/High-salt-conspiration-linked-with-increased-risk-of-developmenting-Type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d481e668-416b-4592-8433-b3c5b817091b Wed, 01 Nov 2023 16:38:00 -0400 High salt consumption associated with increased risk of developing Type 2 diabetes
